title: unable to turn a VS solution into project
body: I would like to compile a VS 2017 solution with msbuild via C# and the MSbuild SDK. However, I am unable to turn a solution into a project by the SolutionWrapperProject.Generate method with a toolsversion 15.0. Not specifying the toolsversion generates a 4.0 project, specifying 15.0 yields an error message. I am using the latest version of the SDK, which has been installed via nuget.

nodes.body:
Can you describe what you're trying to do in more detail, please? In general, if you just want to build a solution, you don't need to generate a project for it--let MSBuild handle it internally.

You also mention using NuGet; are you also using [MSBuildLocator](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/updating-an-existing-application)? That is required to get projects to build.
